title: Father detained by ICE with five-year-old tells US congressman his son has been ‘depressed’
summary_full: Representative Joaquin Castro visited Adrian Conejo Arias and his son Liam at an ICE detention facility in  Dilley, TexasJoaquin Castro, a Texas Democratic congressman, has visited the five-year-old boy and his father who were detained last week by federal immigration agents in Minnesota and transferred to a detention facility in Texas, providing an update about the child’s health and wellbeing.In a social media post on Wednesday, Castro said he visited the boy, Liam Conejo Ramos, and his father, Adrian Conejo Arias, at the immigration detention center in Dilley, Texas.
